data.content:
noun
plural -backs
[count] a return to a former good position or condition
The species was nearly extinct but is now making/staging a comeback.
a return to being popular or fashionable
Short skirts were out of fashion for many years, but now they're making/staging a comeback.
a new effort to win or succeed after being close to defeat or failure
The team was trailing after the first half, but they made/staged a comeback and won in the second half.
The team mounted a comeback in the second half of the season.
a quick reply or response
She seemed to have a clever comeback [=retort] for everything I said. - see also come back at 1come
